TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit Menu/MenuItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 表示 物件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別代表的集合物件儲存在， ，或。This class represents the collection of objects stored in a , , or . 如和類別，這個集合代表控制項的整個功能表結構。For the and classes, this collection represents the entire menu structure for the control. 如類別，這個集合代表與相關聯的子功能表項目清單。For the class, this collection represents the list of submenu items associated with the . 和方法可讓您加入和移除集合中個別功能表項目。The and methods enable you to add and remove individual menu items from the collection. 您也可以使用方法從集合中移除所有功能表項目。You can also use the method to remove all the menu items from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會要求，您將集合關聯的類別，衍生自，例如， ，或類別。This class requires that you associate the collection with a class that derives from , such as the , , or class. 因為您必須指定此集合相關聯的功能表，您無法建立多個功能表項目集合，並使其具有功能表依需要產生關聯。Since you must specify a menu that is associated with this collection, you cannot create multiple menu item collections and associate them with a menu as needed. 若要切換相關功能表的功能表項目，您必須清除項目的集合，並加入至集合中顯示的功能表項目。In order to switch the menu items associated with a menu, you must clear the collection of items and add the menu items to display to the collection.

summary.span: 將新的 加入集合中。

span.span: Adds a new to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A只可包含一個功能表中一次，而且不加入至相同的功能表上的一次以上。A can only be contained in one menu at a time, and cannot be added more than once to the same menu. 若要重複使用在多個功能表中，使用方法類別。To reuse a in more than one menu, use the method of the class. 若要移除您先前加入，請使用方法。To remove a that you have previously added, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別建立主功能表中， `mainMenu1`，具有兩個物件加入至其集合。The following code example uses the derived class to create a main menu, `mainMenu1`, that has two objects added to its collection. 程式碼再指派`mainMenu1`至屬性。The code then assigns `mainMenu1` to the property of the . 這個範例需要在此範例中定義的程式碼會位於與表單。This example requires that the code defined in this example is located with in a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks A只可包含一個功能表中一次，而且不加入至相同的功能表上的一次以上。A can only be contained in one menu at a time, and cannot be added more than once to the same menu. 若要重複使用在多個功能表中，使用方法類別。To reuse a in more than one menu, use the method of the class. 若要移除您先前加入，請使用方法。To remove a that you have previously added, use the method. 這個版本的方法可讓您將先前建立集合內指定索引位置的物件。This version of the method allows you to add previously created objects to a specific index location within the collection. 任何目前位於該索引，以及所有物件，該索引之後, 會移至下一步的最低索引集合中。Any currently located at that index, and all objects after that index, are moved to the next lowest index in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立在衍生類別的執行個體，並將物件至其集合功能表中的特定位置的物件項目集合。The following code example creates an instance of the derived class, , and adds a object to its collection of objects at a specific location in the menu item collection. 這個範例需要在此範例中定義的方法是位於表單的類別，以及該表單類別中的方法所呼叫。This example requires that the method defined in this example is located within the class for a form and called by a method in that form class. remarks.format: ## Remarks A只可包含一個功能表中一次，而且不加入至相同的功能表上的一次以上。A can only be contained in one menu at a time, and cannot be added more than once to the same menu. 若要重複使用在多個功能表中，使用方法類別。To reuse a in more than one menu, use the method of the class. 若要移除您先前加入，請使用方法。To remove a that you have previously added, use the method. 這個版本的方法可讓您指定標題的功能表項目和委派會處理其事件。This version of the method allows you to specify a caption for the menu item and a delegate that will handle its event. 您可以使用這個版本的方法，如果您的應用程式已取得事件處理常式來處理事件。You can use this version of the method if your application already has an event handler to handle the event. 這個版本的方法也可讓您指定的陣列先前建立您想要加入至集合的物件。This version of the method also allows you to specify an array of previously created objects that you want to add to the collection. 您可以使用這項功能要重複使用現有使用複製的物件方法。You can use this feature to reuse existing objects that have been cloned using the method. 如果`items`參數不是空白或`null`、加入至集合會包含子功能表項目。If the `items` parameter is not empty or `null`, the being added to the collection will contain submenu items. > [!NOTE] > 事件不會引發，其中包含子功能表項目。The event is not raised for a that contains submenu items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來清除整個從功能表的功能表項目的集合。You can use this method to clear the entire collection of menu items from a menu. 若要從集合中移除個別的功能表項目，使用方法。To remove an individual menu item from the collection, use the method. 若要加入新物件加入集合中，使用方法。To add new objects to the collection, use the method. ## Examples 在此範例中，您會建立主功能表中， `myMainMenu`，具有兩個物件`File`和`Edit`。In this example, you create a main menu, `myMainMenu`, with two objects, `File` and `Edit`. `File`功能表有三個 子功能表項目， `New`， `Open`，和`Exit`。The `File` menu has three submenu items, `New`, `Open`, and `Exit`. 使用`Clear`方法中，移除所有中的物件`File`功能表集合。Using the `Clear` method, you remove all the objects in the `File` menu collection. 此程式需要，您已經建立名為`Form1`。This program requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. span.span: The number of objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Count`屬性會保留數目指派給集合物件。The `Count` property holds the number of objects assigned to the collection. 您可以使用`Count`上限迴圈來逐一查看集合的屬性值。You can use the `Count` property value as the upper bounds of a loop to iterate through a collection. 請記住，索引值的集合是以零為起始的索引，因此您必須減迴圈變數。Keep in mind, the index value of a collection is a zero-based index, so you must subtract one from the looping variable. 如果您不會考慮這個，您將超出上限的集合，並擲回例外狀況。If you do not account for this, you will exceed the upper bounds of the collection and throw an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立主功能表中， `myMainMenu`，其中包含一個， `File`，有三個 子功能表項目： `New`， `Open`，和`Exit`。The following code example shows how to create a main menu, `myMainMenu`, with one , `File`, that has three submenu items: `New`, `Open`, and `Exit`. 使用`Count`屬性中的物件數目計數`File`功能表和訊息方塊顯示這個數字。Using the `Count` property, you count the number of objects in the `File` menu and display this number in a message box. 這個範例需要您已建立名為`Form1`。This example requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[CountProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CountProperty/CPP/countitems.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CountProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CountProperty/CS/countitems.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CountProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CountProperty/VB/countitems.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立主功能表中， `myMainMenu`，具有兩個物件`File`和`Edit`。The following code example shows how to create a main menu, `myMainMenu`, with two objects, `File` and `Edit`. `File`功能表有三個 子功能表項目： `New`， `Open`，和`Exit`。The `File` menu has three submenu items: `New`, `Open`, and `Exit`. 使用方法，擷取的索引`Exit`中的項目`File`功能表集合，然後在訊息方塊中顯示其值。By using the method, you retrieve the index of the `Exit` item in the `File` menu collection, and then display its value in a message box. 這個範例需要您已建立名為`Form1`。This example requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果稱為連續，最後一個傳回索引會檢查索引鍵的符合項目第一次，而且如果沒有相符項目，搜尋會從集合的開頭。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection. 屬性會對應至索引鍵中。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 索引鍵的比較不區分大小寫。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果`key`參數是`null`或空字串，或沒有符合的成員，傳回-1。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, or there are no matches, returns -1.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Remove (System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem item);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Remove(class System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem item) cil managed

span.span: The to remove.

summary.span: 從功能表項目集合中移除指定的 。

span.span: Removes the specified from the menu item collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當從功能表項目集合，而所有後續的功能表項目都會移一個位置，集合中移除。When a is removed from the menu item collection, all subsequent menu items are moved up one position in the collection. 您可以使用這個版本的`Remove`移除特定使用的參考，從集合移除。You can use this version of the `Remove` to remove a specific from the collection using a reference to the to be removed. 如果您不需要的參考，您想要移除，您可以使用這個方法可接受參數，對應到索引的其他版本移除。If you do not have a reference to the that you want to remove, you can use the other version of this method that accepts, as a parameter, an index corresponding to the to be removed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立主功能表中， `myMainMenu`，具有兩個物件`File`和`Edit`。The following code example shows how to create a main menu, `myMainMenu`, with two objects, `File` and `Edit`. `File`功能表有三個 子功能表項目： `New`， `Open`，和`Exit`。The `File` menu has three submenu items: `New`, `Open`, and `Exit`. 使用`Remove`方法中，移除`Open`項目從`File`功能表集合。Using the `Remove` method, you remove the `Open` item from the `File` menu collection. 這個範例需要您已建立名為`Form1`。This example requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[RemoveMenuItems#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RemoveMenuItems/CPP/removeitems.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemoveMenuItems#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RemoveMenuItems/CS/removeitems.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemoveMenuItems#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RemoveMenuItems/VB/removeitems.vb#1)]
